thread.title: Crompco Welcomes Sandy Carl as Manager of Environmental Compliance Services

author: cnbc.com
title: Crompco Welcomes Sandy Carl as Manager of Environmental Compliance Services

organizations.name: st) compliance testing and compliance management

text:
PLYMOUTH MEETING, Pa., March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Crompco , a leading Underground Storage Tank (UST) Compliance Testing and Compliance Management company, is pleased to announce that Sandy Carl, former Sunoco Performance & Compliance specialist, has joined the company as Manager of Environmental Compliance Services. She brings over 35 years of retail fuel experience to the new Crompco role, in which she will help Crompco customers understand and comply with new and upcoming UST and air quality regulations.
"I'm thrilled to join Crompco and excited about the company's commitment to support customers in navigating the ever-changing and increasing regulatory demands. I look forward to working with the Compliance Management team and building relationships with our customers." - Sandy Carl, Manager of Environmental Compliance Services, Crompco
Carl joins Crompco from a 35-year tenure at Sunoco. In her most recent position as Performance & Compliance Coordinator, she was responsible for managing site inspections and resolving compliance violations at approximately 1,300 Sunoco owned/operated service stations across 12 states. As Manager of Environmental Compliance Services, Carl will tap into her extensive expertise as she supports Crompco customers across the United States in the management of environmental and regulatory compliance.
Compliance with local, state and federal UST and air quality regulations requires constant vigilance. Crompco works closely with its customers to submit UST registrations and air permits, manage equipment testing schedules, verify and submit test results, and provide state-specific training and guidance.
"In today's rapidly changing regulatory environment, it's more important than ever to guide our clients through new regulations and help them ensure compliance so they are not subject to undetected leak and equipment malfunctions, costly fines, penalties, and environmental contamination. Crompco customers will directly benefit from Carl's 35 years of experience in the trenches of UST inspections and compliance at Sunoco." - Bob Dee, President of Crompco

About Crompco
Crompco is the nation's industry leader in compliance testing and site management solutions. With 35 years of experience in the petroleum industry, Crompco has expanded from "one man and a truck" to over 220 employees and more than 75 fully trained crews dispersed throughout the United States.
Crompco is headquartered in Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania. Customers include independent operators, private sector companies, government entities and many of today's largest fuel retailers. www.crompco.com
